mapper.select: select * from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ in (select TASK_ID_ from act_hi_varinst where NAME_='dealUserId' and TEXT_= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from act_hi_procinst where PROC_INST_ID_ in (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_varinst where NAME_='startUserId' and TEXT_=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from act_hi_actinst where ACT_TYPE_='endEvent' and PROC_INST_ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ =#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) limit 0,1
mapper.delete: delete from act_hi_actinst where ACT_TYPE_='endEvent' and PROC_INST_ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ =#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
